title: Can't connect to league servers
body:
Whenever i try to spectate or start a match, whether it be custom, ranked, normals, any mode, the screen is black for about 10 seconds after initiating the loading screen, and then says "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your connection and try again". After numerous attempts, the issue repeats, and if I just hit "cancel", and try to reconnect, it never works.

My internet and connectivity is fine, I've been streaming movies and other online games throughout the day and I play with an Ethernet cable, I've already tried using the in-client repair option, uninstalling and reinstalling, and the issue still persists.

 If you have any idea on how to fix the issue any input would be appreciated!

replies.body:
While you have good connection to movie streaming sites and other games, there could still be configurations or routing issues causing issues with your ability to connect to our gameservers. As a next step, I'd strongly recommend checking our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) out to ensure your local network configurations are set correctly for League.

If you still encounter these issues after taking those steps, let me know.
looks like riots having problems right now, a few people have been disconnected from their games and cant reconnect too. started for me personally about 30 mins ago
